class.rdfs:comment: An alternative, closely-related condition typically considered later in the differential diagnosis process along with the signs that are used to distinguish it.
class.rdfs:label: DDxElement

schema:diagnosis.rdfs:comment: One or more alternative conditions considered in the differential diagnosis process as output of a diagnosis process.
schema:diagnosis.rdfs:label: diagnosis

schema:distinguishingSign.rdfs:comment: One of a set of signs and symptoms that can be used to distinguish this diagnosis from others in the differential diagnosis.
schema:distinguishingSign.rdfs:label: distinguishingSign
